TopicTitle: Robbaz does the Kerbal Space Program

Articles.Content:
Warn you guys & gals the language is bad, but he is funny as hell. 

Enjoy:

Part I

Part II

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fmf8USbYKVM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
only to minuets into part one, he resorts to 'MOAR BOOSTAZZ' ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
I got into this game because he made a video on it. And its been amazing ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Cool vids 8)

I got into KSP via youtube as well
I got into KSP via Notch.

Best part about this game: Recording friends trying it for the first time and laughing while sitting in the background. Do it to your friends, its great! You just cant be funny with this game if you know what you\'re doing, I turn into a mission control type person as I have it down to a science.
Very funny. But I raged when he didn\'t use symmetry. WHY

> 
> I got into this game because he made a video on it. And its been amazing ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yep, same here. Saw his video on it and came running over to throw my $15 at the screen. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Very funny. But I raged when he didn\'t use symmetry. WHY

Because Vikings DON\'T NEED symmetry!
